options.name: Falconry
options.description: Gain +1 Animals. If you utilize a Pet with a Flight Speed to make an Assisted Check while Searching, gain a 1d4 Bonus to your Check.

options.name: Fletcher
options.description: Gain +1 Ammocraft and +1 Damage to Ranged Weapons

options.name: Of the Land
options.description: Gain +1 Movement Speed. Your Swim and Climb Speed become equal to your Movement Speed and you take Half Damage from falling.

options.name: Action : Hunters Instinct
options.description: You make a Ranged Attack against a Creature. If the Attack hits, you make a Contested Initiative Check against the Target. On a success, the Creature takes an extra 1d10 Damage. If the Creature is a Beast, the extra damage becomes 2d12.

options.name: Reaction : Quick Shot
options.description: In response to a Creature Attacks makes a Melee Attack against you, make an uncoordinated Attack at them with a 1d4 Penalty, lowering their Attack by the same amount.

options.name: Ranger of the Wilds
options.description: Gain +1 Attack with Slashing, Piercing, Crushing and Ranged Weapons and +1 Wilderness
